metadata.title: CVE-2023-24023 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Bluetooth BR/EDR devices with Secure Simple Pairing and Secure Connectionspairing in Bluetooth Core Specification 4.2 through 5.4 allow certainman-in-the-middle attacks that force a short key length, and might lead todiscovery of the encryption key and live injection, aka BLUFFS.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty/esm is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty/esm is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty/esm is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty/esm is affected and may need fixing.
